info.description:
Flexible Lighting
Tall or short, bright or dim - tweak your lighting to suit you. Set the mood by adjusting the grate to allow more or less light to shine through.

Luxe Finish
Beautifully finished, with smooth stainless steel and contrasting white lacquered legs. Also available in natural wood and black.

Statement Lighting
Ideal for adding a little vintage glamour to your home. Double up for extra impact or pair with a leather sofa for a complete look.

whybuy.Flexible Lighting: Tall or short, bright or dim - tweak your lighting to suit you. Set the mood by adjusting the grate to allow more or less light to shine through.

Product Details.Materials: Stainless steel and wood; black cable

Product Details.Bulb: Requires max 40W E27 bulb - not included

Product Details.Adjustable: Yes - height; angle and position of shade

info.name: Alfred Tripod Floor Lamp in white
